Name: Llechwedd
Notes: Currently worked on a small scale and the site of the Llechwedd Slate Caverns tourist attraction

Name: Maenofferen
Notes: Became the major owner of quarries connected via inclines at Duffws station, continued to use the stub of the FfR through Blaenau into the mid 1970s. Untopping operations continue in 2007.

Name: Nyth-y-Gigfran
Notes: Sometimes known as Glan-y-Pwll quarry. Became part of the Oakeley Quarry

Name: Matthews (Rhiwbryfdir)
Notes: Became part of the Oakeley quarry

Name: Manod
Notes: Sometimes known as Bwlch y Slaters and now given the name Cwt y Bugail. Connected to the Festiniog by the Rhiwbach Tramway

Name: Moelwyn Slate
Notes: Remote quarry connected to the FfR by a series of seven inclines; worked intermittently and never successfully.
